===Etymology===
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おおやまつみ|大|tr1=ō|t1=great|山|tr2=yama|t2=mountain|つ|tr3=tsu|pos3={{etyl|ojp|-}} possessive particle|神|tr4=mi|t4=god, spirit}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おおやまつみ}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|大山津見}}, {{ja-l|大山積}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|おおやまつみ|hhira=おほやまつみ}}

# {{lb|ja|mythology|Shinto|sort=おおやまつみ}} the [[kami]] of the mountains, brother of [[Amaterasu]], [[Tsukuyomi]], and [[Susanoo]]

====Usage notes====
Often followed by an [[epithet]], such as {{m|ja|の}}{{m|ja|命|tr=no mikoto||august, the venerable}} or {{m|ja|の}}{{m|ja|神|tr=no kami||the god}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

This spelling appears to be the most common.
